bug.author: jjaacckkyy63
bug.description:
Traceback (most recent call last): File "train.py", line 210, in var=opt.var, File "train.py", line 79, in train load_darknet_weights(model, weights + 'yolov3-tiny.conv.15') File "/home/jovyan/EJ/CTW-Pytorch/yolov3/models.py", line 311, in load_darknet_weights self.seen = header[3] # number of images seen during training IndexError: index 3 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 0 Then I tried directly link to the address, the following shows <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19526787/56377765-b6bede80-623d-11e9-9ec2-f72402dcd4e0.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://pjreddie.com/media/files/yolov3-tiny.conv.15>https://pjreddie.com/media/files/yolov3-tiny.conv.15</denchmark-link> seems to be empty file. Is there any other pretrained weiget for tiny-yolo for the training from custom data? Thank you

comments.comment: This file is available in our Google Drive folder listed in the README.
